name: Space Crawling
description:
An entry for the dungeon crawler game jam!

Could not really finish it on time unfortunately. Although I am pretty happy with what I did there, its not at all a complete game, lots of missing features and unimplemented stats and items.

Move with WASD and QE! Spacebar opens doors and escape brings up your management menu.

Go back to the airlock to visit your ship, there you can shop and recruit new crew members. Reform your party to switch the new crew in.

As you explore the shop inventories rebuild, and new recruits show up.
